object.field:
backcolor = black textcolor = white menucolor = #a1a1a1
body: background: $backcolor color: $textcolor
a: text-decoration: none color: $textcolor
#site-masthead: font-size: 300% text-align: center padding-> top: 20px bottom: 20px
#site-menu: padding: 10px 0px text-align: center border-> top: 1px solid $menucolor bottom: 1px solid $menucolor
a: padding-> left: 50px right: 50px color: $menucolor &.current, &:hover: color: $textcolor
#site-content: padding-top: 30px
p: margin: 20px 0
